turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need to order a pizza from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi there, what would you like to do today?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: order pizza from Bella Luna sure.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need three medium white pizzas with thick crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 3 medium with thick crust, ok what toppings do you want on them?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: all with chicken is that right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok with 3 medium pizza chicken topping all with thick crust your total comes to 54 dollars, shall we order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: They are ordered, tell me where they can be picked up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, your pizza are on order at the local Bella Luna pizzeria and will be ready for pickup in 30 min
